thread.title: Sundance: 'Patti Cake$' Newcomer Signs With Colin Stark Management
thread.title_full: Sundance: 'Patti Cake$' Newcomer Signs With Colin Stark Management

title: Sundance: 'Patti Cake$' Newcomer Signs With Colin Stark Management
text:
George Pimentel/Getty Images for Sundance Film Festival Siddharth Dhananjay Siddharth Dhananjay was discovered by director Geremy Jasper on World Star Hip Hop. 
Patti Cake$ newcomer Siddharth Dhananjay has signed with Colin Stark for management. 
The India-born, Indonesia-raised and Iowa-educated Dhananjay was first discovered by Patti Cake$ director Geremy Jasper on World Star Hip Hop where his parody rap videos were posted under his pseudonym Dhananjay the First. 
The Sundance comedy, which sold to Fox Searchlight for $9.5 million, is the first feature film role for Dhananjay, who plays the best friend and biggest fan of aspiring rapper Patti (Danielle Macdonald). He was signed in a competitive situation, out of the festival. Stark's client list also includes Atlanta 's Lakeith Stanfield, whose break out role also came in a festival indie, Destin Cretton's Short Term 12, and Soldado actor David Castaneda.
